Task 3 - Print all favourite foods JS code


let favFoods = ["Pasta", "Pizza", "Biryani", "Sheesh Kebab", "Chicken Tikka"];
        let foodListElem = document.getElementById("foodList");

        // Create a string with array items separated by line breaks
        let foodListText = favFoods.join("\n");

        // Set the text content of the textarea
        foodListElem.textContent = foodListText;

Task 4 & Task 5 - favourite recipe object


<h1>Hot Chocolate Recipe</h1>
    <div id="recipe"></div>
    <button id="cookButton">Let's Cook!</button>

  

// Create an object to hold information about Hot Chocolate
        const hotChocolateRecipe = {
            name: "Hot Chocolate",
            ingredients: [
                "2 cups milk",
                "2 tablespoons cocoa powder",
                "2 tablespoons sugar",
                "1/4 cup water",
                "1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract",
                "Whipped cream (optional)",
                "Chocolate shavings (optional)"
            ],
            directions: [
                "In a saucepan, mix cocoa powder and sugar with water over medium heat.",
                "Stir until it becomes a smooth paste.",
                "Add milk and continue to stir until hot, but do not boil.",
                "Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.",
                "Pour into mugs and top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings if desired."
            ]
        };

        // Function to display the recipe
        function displayRecipe() {
            // Display the ingredients
            let recipeHTML = "
Ingredients:
    ";
            for (let i = 0; i < hotChocolateRecipe.ingredients.length; i++) {
                recipeHTML += `
  • ${hotChocolateRecipe.ingredients[i]}
    • `;
            }
            recipeHTML += "
";

            // Display the directions
            recipeHTML += "
Directions:
    ";
            for (let i = 0; i < hotChocolateRecipe.directions.length; i++) {
                recipeHTML += `
  1. ${hotChocolateRecipe.directions[i]}
    2. `;
            }
            recipeHTML += "
";

            // Display the recipe on the screen
            document.getElementById("recipe").innerHTML = recipeHTML;
        }

        // Event listener for the "Let's Cook!" button
        document.getElementById("cookButton").addEventListener("click", displayRecipe);
